title: Exquisite Diamond & Gemstone Peacock Vaddanam Style Necklace
materials: embellished with meticulously set brilliant-cut diamonds
and sapphire accents. Features a unique Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous finish.
features: This necklace reimagines the traditional Vaddanam as a stylish neck piece. Features two elaborate floral and peacock motifs. The peacock, a symbol of grace and royalty, is crafted with intricate detail. Features pave setting for maximum diamond sparkle. The design strikes a balance between traditional South Indian aesthetics and contemporary jewelry trends.
colors: Primarily gold and white (diamond) with vibrant pops of ruby red and sapphire blue. This palette evokes the classic South Indian jewelry heritage.
occasions: and special occasions. Its versatile design also makes it perfect for modern celebrations.
description: A unique fusion of traditional South Indian artistry and contemporary design, making it a timeless and versatile addition to your jewelry collection. The vibrant gemstones and sparkling diamonds provide a captivating and luxurious look. It is handcrafted with the utmost care and precision, ensuring its beauty and durability for years to come.
